column4: i'm trying to do sudo apt-get install apache2-doc and it's asking for the feisty fawn cd which i can't find and don't want to burn, can i get apt-get to download the package?
is gksudo gui cause i only have command line
gksu is gui as is gedit.  try sudo nano instead of gksu gedit.
-- yeah, thats the way we do it now.
